string.name: lichessClasses
string.comment:
Lichess Classes are a feature that lets a teacher create virtual classes and check out students' progress.
This text used to be "Lichess Classes", which has since been shortened to "Classes".

resources.string: Múin ranganna daltaí ficheallaithe leis an tsraith uirlisí ranganna Lichess.
Cruthaigh ainmneacha úsáideora agus pasfhocail shábháilte go tapa do daltaí
Rianaigh dul chun cinn na daltaí i gcluichí agus i fadhbhanna fichille
Cuir teachtaireacht chuig gach dalta faoi ábhar nua ranga

string.name: freeForAllForever
string.comment:
The automated QA checker treats "100%" as if it is a variable, and will give a warning if you change it. It is not a variable.
You can still save your translation writing it as "%100" for example, in case this is more valid in your language.

resources.string: 100% saor in aisce do chách, go deo, gan aon fhógraí nó rianairí
Déan iarratas bheith i do Mhúinteoir Lichess

string.name: reopen
string.comment: A button, permitting a teacher to reopen a closed class.

string.name: removeStudent
string.comment: Removes a student from the class. Note the same text is used both for initial removal, and for full erasure.

string.name: removedStudents
string.comment: This is in plural form. It is a heading showing all students who have been removed from the class.

string.name: inviteTheStudentBack
string.comment: A button. Clicking this will re-invite a student that has been removed from the class.

resources.string: Tabhair cuireadh don dalta teacht ar ais
Cuirfear nasc don rang sa ghnáthchúrsa ag deireadh na teachtaireachta, mar sin ní gá duit é a iniaigh roimh ré.
Infheicthe ag múinteoirí agus daltaí an ranga araon
Cuir ainmneacha úsáideora Lichess leis chun cuireadh a thabhairt dóibh mar mhúinteoirí. Ceann sa líne.
Déan cinnte an focal faire a chóipeáil nó a scríobh síos anois. Ní bheidh tú in ann é a fheiceáil arís!

string.name: privateWillNeverBeShown
string.comment: A description of the real name field for members of a class.

resources.string: Príobháideach. Ní thaispeánfar ríomh taobh amuigh den rang. Cabhraíonn sé seo leat cuimhneamh ar cé hé an dalta.
Má tá cuntas Lichess ag an dalta cheana féin, is féidir leat cuireadh a thabhairt dóibh chuig an rang.
Gheobhaidh siad teachtaireacht ar Lichess le nasc chun páirt a ghlacadh sa rang.
Tábhachtach: ná tabhair cuireadh ach do dalta a bhfuil aithne agat orthu, agus ar mian leo páirt gníomhach a glacadh sa rang.
Ná seol cuirí gan iarraidh chuig imreoirí treallach riamh.

string.name: createANewLichessAccount
string.comment: The person who would see this would always be a teacher. In this context, it is to create a new account for a student of their class.

resources.string: Mura bhfuil cuntas Lichess ag an dalta fós, is féidir leat ceann a chruthú dóibh anseo.
Níl ríomhphoist de dhith. Beidh pasfhocal cruaithe, agus beidh ort é a cur chuig an dalta, ionas gur féidir leo logáil isteach.
Tábhachtach: níl cead ag daltaí cuntais iolracha a bheith acu.
Má tá ceann acu cheana féin, bain úsáid as an bhfoirm cuireadh ina ionad.
Ná cruthaigh ach cuntais do mhic léinn fíor. Ná húsáid é seo chun cuntais iolracha a dhéanamh duit féin. Chuirfí cosc ort.

string.name: generateANewUsername
string.comment: A button which lets teachers create a random username for students they are registering.

resources.string: Fáilte go dtí do rang: %s. Seo an nasc le dul isteach sa rang.
Tugtar cuireadh duit a bheith páirteach sa rang \"%s\" mar dalta.
Cliceáil ar an nasc chun an cuireadh a fheiceáil:
Le feiceáil ag na múinteoirí ranga amháín
Tá cuntas an dalta seo faoi bhainistíocht

string.name: release
string.comment:
This used to be 'release'. It is now called 'graduate', and the term is used here as a verb.
'Releasing' an account means making it a full Lichess account. It will no longer be tied to the teacher that created it.

resources.string: Scaoil an cuntas ionas gur féidir leis an dalta é a bhainistiú go neamhspleách.
Ní féidir cuntas scaoilte a bhainistiú arís. Beidh an dalta in ann modh páiste a scoránú agus pasfhocal a athshocrú iad féin.
Fanfaidh an dalta sa rang tar éis a chuntas a scaoileadh.
Seoladh ríomhphoist fíor, uathúil an dalta. Seolfaimid r-phost dearbhaithe chuige, le nasc chun an cuntas a scaoileadh.
Dún cuntas na mac léinn go buan.
Ní bheidh an mac léinn riamh in ann an cuntas seo a úsáid arís. Tá an clabhsúr críochnaitheach. Déan cinnte go dtuigeann agus go n-aontaíonn an mac léinn.
B’fhéidir gur mhaith leat smacht a thabhairt don mhac léinn ar an gcuntas ina áit, ionas gur féidir leo leanúint ar aghaidh ag úsáid.
Níl aon dalta sa rang, fós.
Cuir in iúl do gach dalta
Nuacht ranga ar fad i réimse amháin.
Cuir an nuacht is déanaí ag an mbarr. Ná scrios nuacht roimhe seo.
Scar nuacht le --- Beidh líne chothrománach le feiceáil.

string.name: youAcceptedThisInvitation
string.comment: Appears when revisiting the page of an invitation to a class, which you have already accepted.

resources.string: Ghlac tú leis an gcuireadh seo.

string.name: youDeclinedThisInvitation
string.comment: Appears when revisiting the page of an invitation to a class, which you have already declined.

string.name: orSeparator
string.comment: Used as separator between invite sections. Shown as large '~ or ~'.

resources.string: Cruthaigh cuntais Lichess iolracha ag an am céanna

string.name: multipleAccsFormDescription
string.comment: %s is a link and will be replaced with the translation of useThisForm. Make sure both strings fit together.

resources.string: Is féidir leat %s freisin chun cuntais Lichess iolracha a chruthú ó liosta ainmneacha mic léinn.

string.name: useThisForm
string.comment: Link text in multipleAccsFromDescription

string.name: maxStudentsNote
string.comment: %1$s will be replaced with a large number (currently 100).\n%2$s is a link and will be replaced with the translation of createMoreClasses. Make sure both strings fit together.

resources.string: Tabhair faoi deara gur féidir suas le %1$s dalta a bheith i rang. Chun níos mó mac léinn a bhainistiú, %2$s.

string.name: createMoreClasses
string.comment: Link text in maxStudentsNote

string.name: studentsRealNamesOnePerLine
string.comment: An instruction on how to enter students' names when creating new accounts for them.

resources.string: Ainmneacha ceart na mac léinn, ceann in aghaidh an líne

string.name: xisNowAStudentOfTheClass
string.comment: %s is the player's name

resources.string: Is mac léinn den rang é %s anois

string.name: anInvitationHasBeenSentToX
string.comment: %s is the username of a player already registered on Lichess.

string.name: xAlreadyHasAPendingInvitation
string.comment: An error message. %s is the username of a player already registered on Lichess.

resources.string: Tá cuireadh ar feitheamh ag %s cheana féin

string.name: xIsAKidAccountWarning
string.comment: %1$s is the username %2$s is a link.

resources.string: Is cuntas páiste é %1$s agus ní féidir leis do theachtaireacht a fháil. Caithfidh tú an cuiridh URL a thabhairt dóibh de lámh: %2$s
